description: Single source of truth for all Skuld intake questions. Claude MUST read this file before asking any selection question.

personal_name_dob.question_text: What is your full legal name and date of birth?
personal_name_dob.note: FIRST question. Use direct markdown prompt, NOT AskUserQuestion.

options.label: Unmarried but cohabiting with a partner

state_of_residence.question_text: Which state do you reside in?
state_of_residence.example: TN, CA, TX, FL, NY, etc.
state_of_residence.note: Accept 2-letter state abbreviation. Validate against US states. TN triggers CPT screening.

options.label: No, I need to make corrections

children_relationship_type.question_text: Are all of your children from your current marriage/relationship?

options.label: No, some are from prior relationships or stepchildren

child_relationship_detail.question_text: Is [child_name] from your current relationship, a prior relationship, a stepchild, or adopted?
child_relationship_detail.note: Asked for each child when blended family detected

spouse_citizenship.question_text: Is your spouse a U.S. citizen?

options.label: No (permanent resident, visa holder, or other status)

partner_included.question_text: Would you like to include your partner in your estate plan?

options.label: Yes, my partner is a significant beneficiary
Yes, but my partner should receive specific items only
No, I have other beneficiaries in mind

partner_healthcare_agent.question_text: Would you like your partner to serve as your healthcare agent? This allows them to make medical decisions if you're incapacitated and ensures hospital visitation rights.

options.label: Yes, I want them as my healthcare agent
No, I'll designate someone else for healthcare decisions

partner_financial_agent.question_text: Would you like your partner to serve as your financial agent (Power of Attorney)? This allows them to manage your finances if you're incapacitated.

options.label: Yes, I want them as my financial agent
No, I'll designate someone else for financial decisions

cpt_relocation_risk.question_text: Are you planning to relocate outside Tennessee in the next 5-10 years?

cpt_divorce_history.question_text: Has either spouse ever been through a divorce or legal separation?

cpt_separate_property.question_text: Did either spouse bring significant separate property (pre-marital or inherited) into the marriage?

options.label: No, most assets acquired during marriage

cpt_liability_profession.question_text: Is either spouse in a profession with high liability exposure (doctor, attorney, business owner with personal guarantees)?

cpt_election.question_text: Would you like to structure your trust as a Tennessee Community Property Trust?

options.label: Yes, I want the double step-up in basis benefit
No, standard revocable trust is fine
I'd like to discuss this with my attorney first

special_needs_screening.question_text: Do any of your children have special needs, a disability, or currently receive government benefits like SSI, Medicaid, or disability services?

options.label: Not currently, but I anticipate one might in the future

custody_order.question_text: Is there an existing court custody order or parenting plan for your children?

options.label: Yes, there is a custody order

custody_order_succession.question_text: Does your custody order include any provisions about what happens to the children if something happens to you?

options.label: Yes, it has standby guardian or succession provisions
No, it only covers current custody arrangement

child_age_status.note: Asked for each special needs child

government_benefits_status.question_text: Does [child_name] currently receive any government benefits? (select all that apply)

options.label: Has a court-appointed guardian or conservator

snt_trustee.question_text: Should we designate a different trustee for [child_name]'s Special Needs Trust than your main trust trustee?

options.label: Yes, I want to name a specific SNT trustee
No, use the same trustee as my main trust
I have a question about this

able_account_interest.question_text: Is [child_name] eligible for or interested in an ABLE account? (tax-advantaged savings for disability expenses)

letter_of_intent.question_text: Would you like to create a Letter of Intent for [child_name]? (A personal document describing care preferences, routines, and important information for future caregivers)

prenuptial_agreement.question_text: Do you have a prenuptial or postnuptial agreement?

prenup_covers_death.question_text: Does your agreement specify how assets should be distributed at death? (This may affect our trust structure)

financial_assets.question_text: Which financial assets do you have? (select all that apply)

other_assets.question_text: Do you have any of these? (select all that apply)

life_insurance_value.question_text: What is the approximate total death benefit across all policies?

life_insurance_beneficiary.question_text: Who is currently named as beneficiary on your life insurance?

retirement_value.question_text: Approximate total value across all retirement accounts?

retirement_beneficiaries.question_text: Who is currently named as beneficiary on these accounts?

business_partners.question_text: Do you have partners or other owners?

buy_sell_agreement.question_text: Is there an existing buy-sell agreement?

business_succession_preferences.question_text: What should happen to the business if you die or become incapacitated?

options.label: Partners should buy out my share

special_circumstances.question_text: Do any of these apply to your situation? (select all that apply)

options.label: Planning for Medicaid within next 5 years

current_asset_titling.question_text: How are your major assets currently titled?

tbe_home_appreciation.question_text: How much has your home appreciated since purchase?
tbe_home_appreciation.condition: state == TN AND current_asset_titling == tbe AND cpt_election IN (yes, discussing)
tbe_home_appreciation.note: Only asked if CPT elected - determines step-up benefit value

tbe_blended_home_plan.question_text: With TBE, the surviving spouse owns the home outright. How do you want to handle this?

options.label: That's fine - we trust each other
Survivor lives there for life, then to first-to-die's children
Transfer to trust now for control over distribution

tbe_blended_home_plan.condition: state == TN AND current_asset_titling == tbe AND blended_family == true
tbe_blended_home_plan.note: Critical - TBE survivorship can accidentally disinherit children

tbe_transfer_decision.question_text: Based on your situation, how would you like to handle your TBE home?

options.label: Keep TBE during life, transfer via pour-over at death
Keep TBE, surviving spouse uses TOD deed

session_timeout_proceed.question_text: How would you like to proceed?

options.label: Start fresh with a new session

trust_funding_needs.question_text: Will you need to transfer real estate or open accounts in the trust's name?

options.label: Yes, I have real estate to transfer
Yes, I need to open trust bank/brokerage accounts

beneficiary_coordination_checklist.question_text: Would you like me to generate a Beneficiary Designation Coordination Checklist for your retirement accounts and life insurance policies?

document_acceptance.question_text: Would you like to proceed with these recommended documents?

options.label: Yes, proceed with all recommended documents
I want to customize which documents to include
I have questions about these documents

trust_structure.question_text: Since you're married, how would you like to structure your trust?

options.label: Joint trust (both as co-grantors - recommended for first marriages)
Separate trusts (each spouse has their own trust)

tn_real_estate_details.question_text: Do you own real estate in Tennessee?

tod_interest.question_text: Would you like to consider a Transfer-on-Death (TOD) deed for your Tennessee real estate? This allows property to pass without probate while you keep full control during your lifetime.

options.label: Yes, I'd like to learn more
No, I'll handle property through my trust or will

tod_property_count.question_text: How many Tennessee properties do you own?

tod_incapacity_concern.question_text: How important is having someone manage your property if you become incapacitated?

options.label: Very important - I want seamless management
Not a concern - I have other arrangements

tod_distribution_complexity.question_text: How should your Tennessee property be distributed?

options.label: Simple - to spouse or children equally
Conditional - age restrictions, life estate, or other conditions

tod_proceed.question_text: Would you like to include a Transfer-on-Death Deed for your Tennessee property?

options.label: No, I'll fund property to my trust instead

tod_proceed.condition: state == TN AND has_tn_real_estate == true AND tod_recommendation != not_recommended

tod_beneficiary_selection.question_text: Who should receive this property at your death?

healthcare_preferences_life_support.question_text: If you were terminally ill or permanently unconscious with no reasonable expectation of recovery, what are your wishes regarding life-sustaining treatment?

options.label: I want all possible life-sustaining measures
I want comfort care only (pain management, no extraordinary measures)
I want limited intervention (try treatment, but stop if no improvement)
I want to discuss this with my healthcare agent

healthcare_preferences_organ_donation.question_text: What are your wishes regarding organ and tissue donation?

options.label: Yes, donate any organs/tissues that can help others
No, I do not wish to donate
Let my family decide at the time

financial_agent_selection.question_text: Who should serve as your financial agent (Power of Attorney)?

healthcare_agent_selection.question_text: Who should make healthcare decisions for you if you cannot?

guardian_preferences.question_text: Who would you like to name as guardian for your minor children?

options.label: I have a question about this

executor_preferences.question_text: Who should serve as executor of your will?

distribution_preferences.question_text: How would you like assets distributed to your beneficiaries?

options.label: All at once when they inherit
I have a question about distribution options

distribution_age_schedule.question_text: At what ages should children receive their inheritance?

options.label: Staggered later: 1/3 at 30, 1/3 at 35, remainder at 40
Staggered earlier: 1/3 at 21, 1/3 at 25, remainder at 30

distribution_age_schedule.condition: has_children == true AND distribution.pattern IN (all_at_once, staggered)
distribution_age_schedule.note: Only shown if user chose all_at_once or staggered distribution pattern.

distribution_custom_ages.question_text: Specify your custom distribution ages (e.g., '1/3 at 28, 1/3 at 32, remainder at 38'):

distribution_equality.question_text: Should all children inherit equal shares?

options.label: Yes, equal shares to all children (Recommended)
No, I want different percentages for each child

distribution_equality.note: Only asked when there are multiple children.

distribution_per_child_shares.question_text: What percentage should each child receive? (Must total 100%)
distribution_per_child_shares.note: Dynamically generates inputs for each child. Validates total equals 100%.

distribution_method.question_text: If a child passes away before receiving their inheritance, what happens to their share?

options.label: To their children (your grandchildren) - Per Stirpes (Recommended)
Split among surviving children - Per Capita

distribution_method.note: Per stirpes is most common; keeps inheritance in each child's 'branch'.

spendthrift_preference.question_text: Should your trust protect beneficiaries' inheritance from creditors and lawsuits?
spendthrift_preference.note: Most attorneys recommend spendthrift clauses. Sets flag for existing template provision.

residence_disposition.question_text: What should happen to your primary residence after your death?

options.label: Spouse can live there for life, then to children
Held in trust (trustee decides when to sell)
Reserved for special needs child to live in

residence_sale_restriction.question_text: Should there be restrictions on selling the residence?

options.label: Cannot sell for a specific number of years
All beneficiaries must agree to sell
Right to live in family home

snt_housing_provision.note: Asked for each special needs child. Substitute [child_name].

snt_housing_expenses.question_text: Who pays property taxes, insurance, and repairs on [child_name]'s housing?

options.label: Special Needs Trust (may reduce SSI benefits)

snt_housing_expenses.note: ISM warning required - shelter payments may reduce SSI.

snt_housing_remainder.question_text: When [child_name] no longer needs the housing, who receives the property?

options.label: Sell and distribute per trust terms
